alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 6:28PM CDT until September 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monticello, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello... Dermott... Arkansas City... Tillar... Green Hill... McGehee... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Jerome... Baxter... New Hope in Drew County... Enon... Halley... Masonville... Collins... McArthur... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
